actions.name: AcceptConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to accept a request to connect this account to a CodeCatalyst space

actions.name: AssociateIamRoleToConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an IAM role to a connection

actions.name: DeleteConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a connection

actions.name: DisassociateIamRoleFromConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate an IAM role from a connection

actions.name: GetBillingAuthorization
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the billing authorization for a connection

actions.name: GetConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to get a connection

actions.name: GetPendingConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to get a pending request to connect this account to a CodeCatalyst space

actions.name: ListConnections
actions.description: Grants permission to list connections which are not pending

actions.name: ListIamRolesForConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to list IAM roles associated with a connection

actions.name: PutBillingAuthorization
actions.description: Grants permission to creates or update the billing authorization for a connection

actions.name: RejectConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to reject a request to connect this account to a CodeCatalyst space
